casebody.data:
HOKE COUNTY
v.
STATE and State Board. No. 530PA02. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 30, 2004. Grayson E. Kelley, Edwin W. Speas, Senior Deputy Attorney Generals, Thomas J. Ziko, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State and State Board of Education. Robert H. Tiller, Melanie Black Dubis, Raleigh, for Hoke County et al. Ann L. Majestic, Raleigh, for Ingram et al. Ann W. McColl, Raleigh, for N.C. Assoc. of School Admin. Seth H. Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU of N.C. Legal Foundation. Sheria Reid, Carlene McNulty, Gregory C. Malhoit, Raleigh, for Counsel for Rural School and North Carolina Justice and Community Development Center. Deborah Greenblatt, for Carolina Legal Assistance. John Charles Boger, for UNC Law Center for Civil Rights. John Gresham, S. Luke Largess, Charlotte, for North Carolina Association of Educators. Romallus O. Murphy, Greensboro, for the NC NAACP.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of October 2003 by Plaintiff-Intervenors to Amend Record and Correct Caption:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of July 2004."
